snippet.title: Futuridium EP Deluxe launch trailer
snippet.description:
Futuridium finally out on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita 30 September (US) and 1 October (EU)!
http://www.futuridium.com

As a lone starship pilot lost in a dimensional loop, destroy giant space dreadnoughts to survive in a unique blend of shooting, music, speed, original game mechanics, retro look and psychedelic visuals.

- A huge campaign with 50 different levels
- 5 bosses
- Unique gameplay mechanics
- Extra modes to unlock
- Ultra fluid 1080p/60fps action
- Trophies!
- 150 ultra difficult medals to get
- 10 different leaderboards to compete in
- Cross buy PlayStation 4 / PlayStation Vita

And remember: it's only your lasers, your speed and your reflexes that count to reach the top of the leaderboards!
